name: The Hobgoblin Heist
description:
Dwarf diamonds are worth a bunch, and hobgoblins have a knack for stealing.  Sneak into tightly gaurded fortresses, sewers and towers, find the diamond and attempt a daring escape!

---

This was my first time trying to make a sort of stealth game. I know the game is still a bit buggy, but I'm pretty happy with the result.
